from: Description Inspired by classic workwear, this box-fit overshirt is designed with a wider body and a slightly shorter waist. It features a clean, straight hem and large patch pockets, with a cool utility detail: a hanging roulette loop on the left pocket. The front has a half-concealed placket, where the top and bottom buttons are visible while the middle ones are neatly tucked away. This piece is the perfect companion to our Greenport Herringbone Trousers for a complete look.
